code: 'use strict';function flattenStyle(style){if(style===null||typeof style!=='object'){return undefined;}if(!Array.isArray(style)){return style;}var result={};for(var i=0,styleLength=style.length;i<styleLength;++i){var computedStyle=flattenStyle(style[i]);if(computedStyle){for(var key in computedStyle){result[key]=computedStyle[key];}}}return result;}module.exports=flattenStyle;
